attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-1356

Date: 2013-12-12

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Alain Beaudet, President, Canadian Institutes of Health Research, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 10 ($257,200 - $302,500), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of André Beaudet, Secretary, National Battlefields Commission, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 3 ($97,000 - $114,100), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Marc Bosc, Deputy Clerk, House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($147,400 - $173,300), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Suzanne Clément, Coordinator, Office of the Coordinator (Status of Women Canada), as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Chad Gaffield, President, Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 9 ($223,800 - $263,200), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Stevan Horvath, President, Canadian Centre for Occupational Health and Safety, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 5 ($128,100 - $150,700), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin S. MacLeod, Canadian Secretary to the Queen, Advisory Committee on Vice-Regal Appointments, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($147,400 - $173,300), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of John Gregory Peters, Usher of the Black Rod, Senate, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 3 ($97,000 - $114,100), effective October 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of André McArdle, Secretary, Canadian Intergovernmental Conference Secretariat, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 4 ($111,400 - $131,000), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Tom Perlmutter, Government Film Commissioner, National Film Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Michel Perron, Chief Executive Officer, Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 5 ($128,100 - $150,700), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Joel Jeffrey Sokolsky, former Principal, Royal Military College of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), for the period commencing April 1, 2013 and terminating July 31, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Harry James Kowal, Principal, Royal Military College of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective August 1, 2013.

 

 

 

 

 His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Daniel J. Caron, former Librarian and Archivist of Canada, Library and Archives of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), for the period commencing April 1, 2013 and terminating May 15, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Suzanne Fortier, former President, Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 9 ($223,800 - $263,200), effective March 4, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of David McLaughlin, former President, National Round Table on the Environment and the Economy, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective August 7, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gérard Latulippe, former President, International Centre for Human Rights and Democratic Development, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective July 27, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Audrey Elizabeth O'Brien, Clerk of the House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gary William O'Brien, Clerk of the Senate and Clerk of the Parliaments, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2013.

   

 

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin Michael Vickers, Sergeant-at-Arms of the House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($147,400 - $173,300), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Richard Fujarczuk, Law Clerk and Parliamentary Counsel, House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($147,400 - $173,300), effective May 13, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Alan Latourelle, Chief Executive Officer, Parks Canada Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of John R. McDougall, President, National Research Council of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($319,300 - $375,600), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gérald Cossette, Director, Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Elaine Feldman, former President, Canadian Environmental Assessment Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), for the period commencing April 1, 2013 and terminating April 27, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Ronald Lionel Hallman, President, Canadian Environmental Assessment Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($194,500 - $227,800), effective July 8, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Steve MacLean, former President, Canadian Space Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), for the period commencing April 1, 2013 and terminating June 4, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Walter Natynczyk, President, Canadian Space Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($219,100 - $257,700), effective August 6, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Sonia L'Heureux, Parliamentary Librarian, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Thomas J. Lawson, Chief of the Defence Staff, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($219,100 - $257,700), for the period commencing April 1, 2013 and terminating December 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Thomas J. Lawson, Chief of the Defence Staff, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($245,400 - $288,600), effective December 2, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Stephen Wallace, Secretary to the Governor General, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), effective April 1, 2013.

    His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Walter John Natynczyk, former Chief of the Defence Staff, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($245,400 - $288,600), effective October 28, 2012.
